```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("drc")
library("drc")
library("readxl")
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r A}
data_ex1.1 <- read_excel("CE.LIQ.FLOW.062_Tidydata.xlsx")
```

```{r}
data_ex1.1
which(is.na(data_ex1.1$compConcentration))
data_ex1.1$compConcentration[259] <- 0.000195
typeof(data_ex1.1$RawData)
typeof(data_ex1.1$compName)
typeof(data_ex1.1$compConcentration)
```

```{r}
data_ex1.1 %>% ggplot(aes(x = compConcentration + 0.0001, y = RawData, color = compName, shape = expType))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, height = 0.1)+
  labs(title = "Relation between compound concentration and raw data",
       y = "offspring count",
       x = "Compound concentration") +
  scale_x_log10()

```

The positive control for this experiment is ethanol, the negative control for this experiment is S-medium
